verses.text: Abraham \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* well advanced \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* Abraham \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w She|strong="H8248"\w* said, “\w Drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord.” \w She|strong="H8248"\w* \w hurried|strong="H4116"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.
